Site: cryptodonatenow.org  
Title: Crypto Donate Now  
Description: A humanitarian donation platform that enables people to support refugees, the homeless, and vulnerable communities through cryptocurrency donations.  
Purpose: To simplify global crypto-based giving and deliver transparent, direct aid to those in need.  
Languages: English, Arabic, Japanese, German  
Cryptocurrencies Accepted: Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Tether (USDT), Binance Coin (BNB)  
Owner: [Your Name or Organization Name]  
Launch Date: 2025  
Region Focus: Global  
Transparency: Public donation tracking and updates available  
Contact: info@cryptodonatenow.org
